item.title: 4th Heidelberg Laureate Forum
item.description:
I received and invitation and funding to attend the 4th Heildelberg Laureate Forum.

I had an extraordinary opportunity to participate as a young researcher in this year’s 4th Heidelberg Laureate Forum (Heidelberg, Germany). I came away having talked one-on-one with several Turin Award Winners and one Nobel Laureate
